metadata.title: SquareFaceAI - Free AI Pixel Avatar Generator | Square Face Icon Maker
metadata.description: Transform your photo into an adorable square-faced pixel avatar in seconds. Free AI avatar generator for Discord, Twitter, gaming profiles.

hero.subtitleShort: Transform photos into pixel avatars in seconds.
hero.subtitleFull: Transform your photo into an adorable square-faced pixel avatar in seconds. Perfect for social media, gaming profiles, and digital identities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about SquareFaceAI

howItWorks.a: Our AI analyzes your uploaded photo, identifies key facial features, and transforms them into a unique pixel-style avatar while maintaining your likeness.

photoStored.q: Is my photo stored on your servers?
photoStored.a: No. Your photos are processed in real-time and immediately deleted after your avatar is generated. We never store your original images.

formats.q: What image formats do you support?
formats.a: We support JPG, PNG, WEBP, and HEIC/HEIF formats. Images are automatically optimized during upload.

commercial.q: Can I use the avatar commercially?
commercial.a: Free tier avatars are for personal use only. Pro subscribers get a commercial license for unlimited commercial use.

sizes.a: Free users get 256px avatars. Pro users can export up to 1024px for the highest quality.

different.q: How is this different from other avatar generators?
different.a: SquareFaceAI uses advanced AI to create truly personalized avatars that capture your unique features, not just generic templates.

finalCta.title: Ready to Create Your Pixel Avatar?
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of users who've already created their unique avatars. Get started in seconds, no credit card required.

footer.tagline: Transform your photos into unique pixel avatars with AI-powered technology. Your face, pixelated perfectly.
